citation.article-title: Proposal to replace the illegitimate genus name Schineria Toth et al. 2001 with the genus name Ignatzschineria gen. nov. and to replace the illegitimate combination Schineria larvae Toth et al. 2001 with Ignatzschineria larvae comb. nov.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Ignatzschineria larvae (Tóth et al. 2001) comb. nov.
Ignatzschineria larvae (lar.va′e. L. gen. n. larvae of a larva; the type strain was isolated from maggots of Wohlfahrtia magnifica).
Illegitimate homotypic synonym: Schineria larvae Tóth et al. 2001.
The description of the species is as given for Schineria larvae in Tóth et al. (2001).
The type strain is L1/68T (=CIP 107108T=DSM 13226T=NCAIM B01938T).
